MAIN_MESSAGE: it was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 09:06AM in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele and Betws Yn Rhos,  following reports of a low overhead line. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, Due to the extent of the repairs we now expect remaining customers to be restored as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:09AM on 29th March 2021
